name: Test API Tool with Headers
description: A test tool that demonstrates headers functionality
parameters: [{"name": "query", "type": "string", "required": true, "description": "Search query"}, {"name": "limit", "type": "number", "required": false, "default": 10, "description": "Number of results to return"}]
headers: [{"name": "Content-Type", "value": "application/json", "required": true, "description": "Request content type"}, {"name": "Accept", "value": "application/json", "required": true, "description": "Response format"}, {"name": "User-Agent", "value": "Andy-Agentic/1.0", "required": false, "description": "Client identification"}]
